channel.title: [pi] please help [pi] (read read read)
channel.description:
Hey guys, basically I'm having trouble making npcs work.
I had a source, a PI-based source which everything working, and eventually i found out combat was giving errors, and trying to attack monsters was broken.
So i basically switched sources, to another PI-based source, transferred the characters, and moved the codes over one by one.
Now, in the old source that I started off with, the npcs worked fine in the home area that I made, it actually came with the old source.
However, when I transferred them, when I click them to like talk to them, they don't work anymore
What is the solution? (possible reward)

item.title: [pi] please help [pi] (read read read)
item.dc:creator: @TremblayX TremblayX
item.description:
@TremblayX wrote:

Hey guys, basically I’m having trouble making npcs work.

I had a source, a PI-based source which everything working, and eventually i found out combat was giving errors, and trying to attack monsters was broken.

So i basically switched sources, to another PI-based source, transferred the characters, and moved the codes over one by one.

Now, in the old source that I started off with, the npcs worked fine in the home area that I made, it actually came with the old source.

However, when I transferred them, when I click them to like talk to them, they don’t work anymore

What is the solution?
(possible reward)
